name: The packed man
description:
[if you're an epilepsy person(idk what that is) this game is like a poison to you]

yea don't think about downloading it:\

so i made this game for the dream arcade archive game jam, it's a horror version of the old game pacman - and also this is my second project that i actually finish lmao,

i'm actually quite proud of this , it wasn't longer than a few weeks ago that i downloaded godot,
__

the project comes with all the assets and ofcourse the project file, I'm fine with you using whatever you want as long as you :

don't laugh at my code/art/anything...
instead tell me what could be done to make things better

I don't need you to credit me ,but  don't claim the assets as yours 
...since i'm not familiar with macOS/ Linux export, I'll have to wait and learn how to export it for those, so a bit about the game play , 
 I'm sorry to ruin your childhood but I don't know anything about the original ghosts. so i created my own characteristics ,

--> it's pretty simple.
the red one is the default one, it sees at a normal range and moves at a normal speed, if you run from it , you'll escape it. if you walk away from it. it will eventually catch you,
--->
the orange one, is just like the red one, with only difference being it's view range, covering it's back too . 

--->

the pink one is like a tank, it cant move so fast, like, you can just walk away from it and eventually get out of it's view. but it has a really sharp eye and can detect you from far away.

--->

the blue one! -> is just the opposite of the pink one, it moves at speed of light, but has a noticeably short view range, so short that you can actually see it before it detects you

---> all these monsters make different noises , the objective is clear. collect 5 cherries and run away, for good reasons:) you'll see in the game.

---> i just wanted to add this arrow for no reason. hope you enjoy. and forgive me for any shortcomings in the game :P 

oh! and i made this in 5 days , you'll see me showing off this fact later in the game B-)

I'd appreciate feedback at any costs ;)

also don't skip the beginning:| nor the end , you cant skip the end tho ;) but there might be a few surprises waiting for you,

and yes that is a reference to my favorite show,[you'll find once you find it;)]

Ben10 :o [yea ben, that's true]
